channel.title: Lương Vĩ Phú's dev blog - portfolio
channel.description: I am Lương Vĩ Phú, a sofware engineer. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact me. Thank you for visiting my website.

item.title: Does JavaScript Promise.all() run in parallel or sequential?
item.description: JavaScript is a single-threaded programming language, so it can't run multiple things at the same time, Promise.all() actually runs promises concurrently, not in parallel!. Let's dive in to see how it works.
item.author: undefined (undefined)
